title: That moment when you're 9 RP short.
body:
The feels, guys. At least I can get something better for a lesser price. :)

Edit: Just used the last of my RP on Nautilus because he was half off. Thanks, Rito.

replies.body: I was going to say that you could send a Support ticket and Riot would give you the 9RP (from what I've heard). But it seems you already had something else in mind.

Varus, Nautilus, and Singed are currently on sale. I've had my eye on Varus, but I already have multiple long ranged pokers, so I'm going with Nautilus. He seems like a sturdy champion and I need at least 1 good tank.

Also, just because Riot is willing to do that for their players makes them my favorite company. I don't know of any other company that would do that.

We do help out when it comes to small amounts of RP. It's a one time offer - so make sure this is what you'd like to do! 

If you send in a [Support Ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new), we could lend a hand. I'd suggest sending in a doodle, perhaps of what you're looking to purchase with the RP you're asking for. :]
Already spent the RP I had. Thanks, though.
Usually when you submit a ticket like that they ask you to do something for the RP they're giving you, it looks like your price has been set by KateyKhaos.
